segments.text: We're going to talk about Australia . Or your going to talk about Australia . So first of all how any people live in Australia ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Australia ? Oh , there's about twenty million people in Australia right now . A little bit under , but close to twenty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . What are the biggest cities ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The biggest city ? The biggest city is Sydney , then it's followed by Melbourne and then Brisbane and then I think it's Perth . But most of the big cities are on the East Coast of Australia . And Perth is on the west coast , but sort of of out there by itself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Um , if you had to live in one place where would you live ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like Brisbane . I had my teenage years in Brisbane , growing up in Brisbane , um or maybe Sidney because it is a big city , but Brisbane has got the gold coast and the sunshine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , nice . Actually , what is the capital city of Australia ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah , Canberra is the capital city . But is not the biggest city . Sydney is the biggest city . Canberra was made sort of by the politicians so Sydney wouldn't get to crowded . It's a separate territory .
segments.speaker: S2
